question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of popcorn has 225 calories per serving. If a 350 grams bag has 7 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2275 and you have already consumed 1825 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2275 and I have consumed 1825 calories then I have 2275-1825 = <<2275-1825=450>>450 calories left to eat
If each serving of popcorn has 225 calories and I only have 450 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 450/225 of a serving = 2 of a serving
We also know that a 350 grams bag of popcorn has 7 servings, hence each serving has 350 grams/7 = <<350/7=50>>50 gramss
If I can only eat 2 of a serving, then I can eat only 50 grams * 2 = 100 gramss
#### 100
